name: JR Bogopa
description: '''Tabure Thabo Bogopa Junior''' (born 12 March 1987), professionally known as '''JR''', is a South African entrepreneur and musician. He frequently performs [[Motswako]] rap, in both [[Setswana]] and English. He has had two number-one hip hop songs as well as two number-one pop hits on South African charts.{{citation needed|date=February 2015}}
